main.docTitle: Land Registry Trading FundResolution of the Legislative Council
main.text: Resolution made and passed by the Legislative Council under sections 3, 4 and 6 of the Trading Funds Ordinance (Cap. 430) on 30 June 1993.
main.leadIn: Resolved that with effect from 1 August 1993—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: on the recommendation of the Financial Secretary, the Land Registry Trading Fund (the trading fund) shall be established to manage and account for the operation of the government service of the Land Registry;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the services to be provided under the trading fund shall be those specified in Schedule 1;

paragraph.name: c
d
paragraph.leadIn: the net value of the assets of $354,900,000 appropriated to the trading fund shall be shown in the Capital Investment Fund— (E.R. 2 of 2020)

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: as to the balance, as a contribution of trading fund capital;

paragraph.name: e
paragraph.leadIn: the loan referred to in paragraph (d)(i)—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: shall be repayable in 10 equal annual instalments of $23,660,000 each, the first such instalment to become due on 1 August 1994; (E.R. 2 of 2020)

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: shall, as to any balance unpaid, bear interest at a rate equal to the average of the best lending rate quoted by the continuing members of the Committee of The Hong Kong Association of Banks, such interest to be payable annually in arrear.

schedule.name: sch1
schedule.heading: Services to be Provided by the Trading Fund

section.name: s1
section.content: Giving advice on matters relating to registration under the Land Registration Ordinance (Cap. 128).

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: affecting land and capable of being registered under the Land Registration Ordinance (Cap. 128);

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: required under any Ordinance to be registered at the Land Registry.

section.name: s3
section.content: Maintaining any book, register, index or other record of the Land Registry, whether in manual, microfilmed or computerized format.

section.name: s4
section.content: Making available for inspection, or providing copies of, the records of the Land Registry.

section.name: s5
section.content: Conducting on behalf of the Government and public bodies searches of Land Registry records, and compiling reports of such searches.

section.name: s6
section.content: Preparing certified copies of records held by the Land Registry.

section.name: s7
section.content: Providing safe custody for documents delivered to the Land Registry for that purpose.

section.name: s8
section.content: Preparing and verifying memorial forms to accompany documents to be registered in the Land Registry.

section.name: s9
section.content: Acting as a depository for plans deposited in the Land Registry pursuant to any Ordinance.

section.name: s10
section.content: Giving advice on matters relating to registration of owners as a corporation under the Building Management Ordinance (Cap. 344).

section.name: s11
section.content: Processing applications by owners of buildings for registration as a corporation under the Building Management Ordinance (Cap. 344).

section.name: s12
section.content: Issuing certificates of registration of owners of buildings as a corporation under the Building Management Ordinance (Cap. 344).

section.name: s13
section.content: Maintaining a register of corporations of owners of buildings under the Building Management Ordinance (Cap. 344).

section.name: s14
section.content: Making available for inspection, and providing copies of, records of corporations of owners of buildings registered under the Building Management Ordinance (Cap. 344).

section.name: s15
section.content: Preparing certified copies or extracts of records of corporations of owners of buildings registered under the Building Management Ordinance (Cap. 344).

section.name: s16
section.content: Compiling and publishing for sale current indexes of streets, house numbers and lots in Hong Kong.

section.name: s17
section.content: Providing training, giving seminars and publishing materials in respect of registration matters under the Land Registration Ordinance (Cap. 128) and the Building Management Ordinance (Cap. 344).

section.name: s18
section.content: Collating and producing statistics, analyses, information and materials from Land Registry records.

section.name: s19
section.content: Advising on and assisting in the introduction of an alternative system of land registration in Hong Kong.

section.name: s20
section.content: Appearances by the Land Registrar or his representative as witness or amicus curiae in court proceedings.

section.name: s21
section.content: Producing Land Registry records for use in court proceedings.

section.name: s22
section.content: Cancelling memorials of re-entry and vesting notices and serving such memorials and notices on owners under the Government Rights (Re-entry and Vesting Remedies) Ordinance (Cap. 126). (68 of 1999 s. 3)

section.name: s23
section.content: Any service that the Land Registrar may be authorized to provide under or by virtue of any Ordinance.

section.name: s24
section.content: Any service incidental to or conducive to the provision of any of the services specified in this Schedule.
